messages.subject: RE: Headaches (was Exhaustion)
messages.msgSnippet: Kristen, I used to get frequent headaches. Then I found out about feverfew. It doesn t treat a headache you have now (usually), you take some every day and it
messages.messageBody:
Kristen,
I used to get frequent headaches. Then I found out about feverfew. It doesn't treat a headache you have now (usually), you take some every day and it helps prevent them. It can take a few weeks to start working. You can take capsules or eat one leaf from a plant every day. It really helped me. After several months, I didn't need to take it any more. I only get occasional headaches now, usually traceable to allergies. Hope this helps.
Diane


--
"Just as eating against one's will is injurious to health, so
study without a liking for it spoils the memory, and it retains
nothing it takes in." -Leonardo da Vinci
